column5: Sorry for no report guys been a very busy season for me with the Marina and doing charters but here it is ...Been a awesome few days fishing off Dunnville from 65 to 110 row straight out seems the fish are spread all over ...best rigs have been Big Dipsys 185 back on a 2 setting Copper Muffin willow blades and Small Dipsys back 85 105 and 220 off the boards anything copper with Yek blades ... long leads from your dipsy to the harness 6 ft or more . get out and enjoy before they are gone Fishmaster
Amazing. Thanks for posting and the details
Got to me a newfie gal. Or you twisted the kiss da cod rule. LOL     Right on bye. Nice report. How far it be, a row in me toon?  BTW, I thought you be retired or sumthn?
Nice pics! Looks like a great couple of days thanks for sharing
Steve, that first pic takes fish porn to a new level. I new you would have a good year, unlike us mere mortals.  Johnny D
